product_info.description:
--- Page 1 ---
PRODUCT SPEC SHEET
ZD621R/ZD611R DESKTOP PRINTERS
ZD621R/ZD611R Desktop Printers
Premium features, maximum performance, RFID capabilities and
unmatched security
You need a compact, premium RFID printer/encoder that’s built to perform flawlessly – day in and day out. Rely on Zebra’s 4-inch
ZD621R desktop RAIN/RFID printer/encoder, or the ZD611R, the industry’s only 2-inch desktop RAIN RFID printer/encoder. Get it all:
an innovative architecture to power our ever-expanding printer capabilities and software. Unmatched security to safeguard your
sensitive data and shield you from cyberattacks. A large 4.3 in., full-color LCD touch display with intuitive menu. Enhanced features,
communication and field-installable media-handling options, and increased remote-management capabilities. Together, these give
you outstanding print performance and industry-leading reliability, along with unparalleled intelligence and security, to keep you
moving forward.
Zebra RFID: More Transformation, No
Complication
Flexibility for a Broad Range of Uses and Applications
The ZD621R and ZD611R utilize Zebra’s own RE40 RFID module
to support a number of applications across several industries.
Adaptive encoding technology allows for excellent media
flexibility and simple RFID calibration, eliminating complex
placement guidelines. Optimized to efficiently print and
encode labels, tags and wristbands, they give you greater
tracking abilities, deeper visibility and enterprise insights in an
ever-competitive business environment.
RFID Backed by the Broadest, Field-Proven Portfolio
Expanding Zebra’s RFID Desktop
Zebra leverages decades of expertise, design thinking and
Capabilities software development to help you deliver maximum RFID
gains, while minimizing the pains that can come with
Print and Encode 4- and 2-inch Labels and Tags multi-vendor solutions. Zebra gives you the industry’s
Building on the legacy of the ZD500R, the 4-inch ZD621R broadest, field-proven RFID portfolio for unmatched accuracy
features an innovative architecture that is nearly 32% more and interoperability. Look to Zebra’s consistent, fully scaled
powerful. Expanding the desktop RFID line, the ZD611R shares platform that anticipates real-world challenges and elevates
that architecture and is the industry’s only 2-inch desktop RAIN the performance of every system, device, tag and worker.
RFID printer/encoder. Both the ZD621R and ZD611R can
perform more operations simultaneously, deliver best-practice Expect the Best
security and are engineered to evolve with emerging
technology. Premier Printing Performance
From outstanding print quality to RFID printing/encoding,
portability for application flexibility to emerging technology,
and field-installable options, the ZD621R and ZD611R thermal
transfer RFID printers support a wide variety of use cases and
requirements.
The ZD621R and ZD611R–Premium print quality, features, RFID capabilities and reliability for today and
tomorrow.
For more information, please visit www.zebra.com/zd600
--- Page 2 ---
Operate with Ease Unparalleled, Peace-of-Mind Printer Security
Shield yourself from cyberattacks with Zebra’s PrintSecure,
Intuitive User Interface part of Zebra DNA. Easily configure your printers via secure
connections, identify vulnerabilities, block unauthorized access
Interact at a touch with the 4.3 in., full-color LCD touch display.
and more.
Their easy-to-use menus feature step-by-step setup wizards,
troubleshooting animations, media-loading and calibration
Explore Managed Print Services (MPS)
guidance, and support standalone printing applications. The
display also changes color to clearly show printer status at a with Assurance
glance. And, color-coded touch points guide users through
media handling tasks for speedy media changes. Zebra touch
Zebra’s Thermal Printers with Zebra DNA Make MPS Easy
displays are designed and tested for toughness and reliability,
Our printers are engineered for durability, and offer
including robust tolerance to temperature, humidity, dust and
innovative management, analytics and security, making them
other environmental challenges.
ideal for MPS. With the Zebra DNA software suite, your Zebra
MPS provider can lower your operating costs and IT workload

by remotely managing your printers, track and automate
Printer
supplies, and ensure security.
Use the same label formats and applications you’re using
today. These printers support both EPL and ZPL printer
Get the Features you Need, When you

with other printer brands using the Zebra DNA™ Printer Need Them

Turn Your ZD621R and ZD611R Into Portable Printers
Connect Your Way with Comprehensive Communication
Easily transport your ZD621R or ZD611R printer on a cart with
Integrate your ZD621R or ZD611R to your existing wired and Zebra’s battery option. Print where you work to reduce steps
wireless networks or connect them directly to any PC. Every and increase accuracy. Power through a full shift with the
ZD621R and ZD611R comes with Ethernet, USB 2.0 and USB high-capacity battery. A carrying case is also available for the
host, or add an optional dual wireless radio. Choose from ZD621R.¹ Add features without interruption including a
802.11ac Wi-Fi™ and Bluetooth® 4.1 or 802.11ax and field-upgradeable wireless kit and media handling options.
Bluetooth 5.3. Serial is standard on the ZD621R, and optional
on the ZD611R. Print from any Windows™, Android™ or iOS™
Supplies, Service and Support
device, and utilize Zebra’s printer setup mobile app using
Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE).
Zebra Certified Supplies
Engineered for Outstanding Print Quality Printing supplies provide a digital voice for assets across your
supply chain. If something goes wrong with your printing
Like Zebra’s industrial printers, the ZD621R includes a media
supplies, operations are interrupted, productivity suffers and
dancer to ensure maximum quality on every label and tag,
costs rise. That’s why we design, produce and rigorously
regardless of print speed. Further boost print quality with the
pretest our own line of labels, tags and receipt paper to
optional 300 dpi print resolution.
ensure consistent, optimized performance in your Zebra
printer. For industry-leading quality, service and thermal
Zebra DNA for Printers
printing expertise, choose Zebra Certified Supplies.
Print Securely and Confidently, Without Hassles Backed by Zebra’s Worldwide Service and Support
Trust the Zebra DNA suite of software, powered by our Access repair support services anywhere around the globe
Link-OS™ operating system, to get your printer up and through Zebra and its trusted network of more than 10,000
running quickly and securely. Print consistently, and partners. Zebra OneCare™ Maintenance Plans provide
uninterrupted with a solution that enables your printer to enhanced coverage that exceeds standard warranty.
evolve with your business needs.
Update, Troubleshoot and Monitor, All from a Single
Location
With Zebra’s Printer Profile Manager Enterprise, manage all
your Zebra DNA printers anywhere in the world remotely from
one location.
